title: Log in stuck on "Authenticating...." followed by and unidentified error message.
body: I have a 2017 Macbook Pro running macOS Sierra 10.12.6. League ran flawlessly for weeks up until a few days ago, now I can't get past the log in screen. Any possible fixes? Have been trouble shooting for hours (HexTech tool, reconfiguring DNS, etc) and nothing has worked. Please help rito.

replies.body: Thought I'd add that I am playing on University Wifi, and the problem seems to be the same on all laptops I try. The game worked totally fine a day ago.

With that knowledge, it could be entirely possible that your Uni blocked access to our servers. If you're having that exact problem on every pc you try on your Uni network, I'd suggest asking your campus IT for help getting connected.
